attributes.title: Deep Insights Into Delusion And How To Raise Yourself Out Of It!
attributes.description:
24 JULY 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*FALTERING IN DIAGNOSIS OF THE ROOT CAUSE OF THE PROBLEMS IS SOURCE OF DELUSION. WHEN YOU HAVE A STOMACH PAIN, IF YOU FALTER, MISS IN DIAGNOSING WHAT IS THE PROBLEM, WHY THE PROBLEM, YOU WILL NEVER FIND THE RIGHT SOLUTION AND NEVER QUICKLY SOLVE THE PROBLEM. ONE HAS TO FIND THE REAL REASON FOR THE PROBLEM. IT IS TOO SIMPLE IN THE LIFE TO GET INTO DELUSION.

*IF YOU ARE HAVING CONTINUOUS ARGUMENTS, FIGHTS WITH YOUR SPOUSE, PROBLEM IS TOO SIMPLE: YOU HAVE SOMETHING SERIOUSLY WRONG IN YOUR STOMACH. START TAKING NEEM JUICE. DON'T GO FOR DIVORCE. DON'T GO FOR DATING SITEs, GO FOR NEEM JUICE. IF YOU HAVE NOT CLEANED YOUR STOMACH, YOU WILL BE DOING THE SAME THING WITH THE NEW PARTNER.

*THE CONSTANT IRRITATION, FRUSTRATION YOU FEEL, STARTS IN YOUR MANIPURAKA. FIND THE REAL REASON FOR THE PROBLEM. FOR 10 DAYS BE WITHOUT ANGER, IRRITATION, FRUSTRATION IN THE STOMACH; BE GROUNDED OR ROOTED IN THE STOMACH IN A RELAXED WAY WITH HARITAKI AND NEEM JUICE - WHAT I CALL AS SUPERFOOD. YOU WILL SUDDENLY SEE 90% OF THE PROBLEM BETWEEN YOU AND YOUR SPOUSE DISAPPEAR!

*A SMALL EXAMPLE: IN EVERY LEVEL, THE WRONG DIAGNOSIS HAPPENS...FOR EXAMPLE, IF YOU WANT FREEDOM, YOU ARE FEELING SUFFOCATED AND WANT TO BE FREE FROM SOMETHING, DON'T GO FOR CHOICES. CHOICES IS NOT FREEDOM. WORK ON BREAKING THIS SUFFOCATION. NOW YOU CAN’T EVEN GO FOR VACATIONS TO FEEL RELIEVED!

*ALL VACATIONS - CORONA HAS TAKEN AWAY! ALL CHOICES, ALL OPTIONS, CORONA HAS TAKEN AWAY!

*NOW THE ONLY OPTION LEFT FOR YOU IS WORKING INSIDE AND IT IS TOO SIMPLE AND EASY.

*REAL PEOPLE BUILD INNER SPACE. FAKE PEOPLE BLAME OUTER SPACE.

*ANYTHING TO MAINTAIN YOUR PHYSICAL BODY LIKE WORKING OUT, YOGA, GYM, YOU HAVE TO DO IN THE PHYSICAL WORLD. BUT WE ALWAYS DO ALL THIS IN THE MENTAL WORLD. WE PLAN AND GET EVEN IN A BLUEPRINT ON HOW YOU ARE GOING TO BE WITH A 6-PACK AND 18” BICEPS AND YOU EVEN BUY RUNNING SHOES, MULTIPLE BRANDS SOMETIMES!

*SOMETHINGS YOU HAVE TO DO PHYSICALLY, BUT YOU GO ON IMAGINING ABOUT IT. MANY THINGS YOU NEED TO DO MENTALLY, CONSCIOUSLY BUILDING THE ABILITY TO SEE WHAT IS THE REAL SUFFERING AND WHAT IS IMAGINARY SUFFERING….HAVING THAT MUCH OF INNER SILENCE AND SPACE TO SEE WHAT IS REALLY THE GOAL OF YOUR LIFE AND WHAT WILL EXPAND YOUR NEED FOR LIFE

*FREEDOM IS KNOWING YOU CAN MANIFEST THE LIFE YOU WANT JUST LIKE THAT. ACTUALLY YOU ARE FREE. YOU CAN MANIFEST THE LIFE YOU WANT JUST LIKE THAT. WHY DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND I AM THE LIVING EXAMPLE? I WANT TO STAND ON TOP OF THE WORLD AND SCREAM WHICH I AM DOING NOW : “O HUMAN BEINGS! BECAUSE YOU HAVE CONSCIOUSNESS WHICH IS MY OWN REFLECTION, YOU ARE ALL FREE AND YOU ARE ALL EMPOWERED WITH THE LIFE AS YOU WANT. ANYTHING ELSE, ALL THAT ALTERNATE BELIEFS YOU ARE CARRYING, YOUR IMPOSSIBILITY, IS THE BRAINWASHING DONE TO YOU BY THE PEOPLE WHO ARE PLANNING TO EXPLOIT YOU!”

*ANYONE WHO MAKES YOU FEEL YOU CAN'T MANIFEST THE LIFE YOU WANTED IS PLANNING TO EXPLOIT YOU. YOUR SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL (SDHD) REALLY DOES NOT MATTER. YOUR CONSCIOUS DECISION MATTERS.

*SOMEBODY DECIDES, “TODAY ONWARDS, I WILL CONSCIOUSLY SURRENDER MYSELF TO PARAMASHIVA AND MANIFEST PARAMASHIVA IN ME.” THEN NATURALLY HIS SDHD WILL WAKE UP AND SAY, “WHAT ARE YOU TALKING? YOU! PARAMASHIVA? REMEMBER HE DOES ALL THE FIVE ACTIONS - HE CREATES, MAINTAINS, DESTROYS PULLS OUT OF DELUSION AND DESTROYS AND LIBERATES. HOW CAN YOU BE PARAMASHIVA?”

*YOUR INNER MINIATURE VERSION OF YOUR MOTHER-IN-LAW IS YOUR SDHD. CONSCIOUSLY, YOUR LIFE NEVER EVER GETS TOUCHED BY THE IMPACT OF SDHD. ONLY MENTALLY YOU ATTACK YOURSELF AND TIE YOURSELF AND DO NIDRA DEVATA PUJA, NIDRA DEVI SAMADHI.

*THE BEAUTY OF YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS, IT DOES NOT GET AFFECTED EVEN BY DEATH. THEN CAN IT BE AFECTED BY YOUR STUPID SDHD?

*I AM TALKING SOMETHING SCIENTIFICALLY SCIENTIFIC, COSMIC SCIENCE. YOUR EXISTENCE, WHAT YOU FEEL AS YOU CONSCIOUSLY, DOES NOT GET DISTURBED, SHAKEN, EVEN WHEN YOUR BODY OR MIND IS PULLED OUT OF YOU. IT DOES NOT GET SHAKEN BY ANYTHING PULLED OUT OF YOU.

*I AM NOT BRAINWASHING YOU. KEEPING MAHADEVA - PARAMASHIVA AS A WITNESS, I AM REVEALING HIS INNER SPACE; HOW HE IS INSIDE, I AM OPENING TO ALL OF YOU. I AM OPENING A DOOR FOR ALL OF YOU TO EXPERIENCE PARAMASHIVA’S INNERSPACE.
